LoTurco 
On Jun 25, 
2020, at 10:23 AM. 
'cIMIE> 
wrote: 
Good 
morning, 
We will not be going forward 
on June 30. Hopefully, we will see you on July 13. 
-Chambers of Judge Karas 
From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Sent: Wednesday, lune 24, 2020 2:46 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
>; 
>; 
Subject: Re: Ex parte order 
(USANYS <IMME>; Bruce Barket 
; Aida Leisenring 
>; Michael 
Bachrach 
cEM>; 
Good morning, all-
Just inquiring whether the Court is firm on NOT going forward with the Curcio Hearing 
on June 30th. (Mr. Bachrach and I  need to cancel flights and reschedule for the July 13th hearing.) 
Thank you-
Bobbi 
EFTA00030482

BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of 
Bobbi C. Sternheim 
••Covid-19 Notice: The \Vest 19th Street office is currently closed but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use entail or fax, instead of regular mail, for all correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this situation. 
Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and 
then delete this message. Thank you. 
On 
Jun 12, 2020, at 1:44 PM, 
Dear Defense Counsel and Firewall Counsel. 
Attached, please find a brief ex parte order from Judge Karas. The same will be filed under seal. 
--Chambers of Judge Karas 
<16cr832_ex parte order.pdf>
